local_news.title: Laat je inspireren op het VVP Kennisevent Pensioen & Vermogen
local_news.summary: VVP will host the third Pension & Wealth Knowledge Event on 11 February 2026 at AFAS Theater in Leusden, featuring experts Noach van Beusekom and Corné van Zeijl and breakouts by partners including Allianz, Brand New Day, NNEK and others.

local_news.title: Laat je inspireren op het VVP Kennisevent Pensioen & Vermogen
local_news.summary: VVP will host the third Pension & Wealth Knowledge Event on 11 February 2026 at AFAS Theater in Leusden, featuring plenary sessions by top specialists for financial advisers.

local_news.title: Nieuwe schadeverzekeraar betreedt de Nederlandse markt
local_news.summary: Eucare expands into Dutch non-life insurance with a De Nederlandsche Bank license, planning to operate via delegated authorities and establish a presence in Rotterdam, complementing its existing health insurance operations.

national_news.title: Vakbonden: vertrouwen geschaad door ingrepen in sociale zekerheid
national_news.summary: Dutch unions say raising the AOW state pension age breaches the pension accord and erodes trust, warning of possible protests on The Hague’s Malieveld.

national_news.title: Langer doorwerken: dertiger van nu pas met 70 jaar met pensioen
national_news.summary: Dutch coalition parties propose linking AOW retirement age to life expectancy from 2033. CPB projects the state pension age could reach 70 years and 9 months by 2060.

national_news.title: Marktreacties: 'Kabinet-Jetten lost hypotheekknelpunten vooralsnog niet op'
national_news.summary: Dutch reactions to Jetten cabinet’s coalition pact: De Hypotheekshop says mortgage bottlenecks persist; NHG welcomes sustainability plans, warns of a split for poor-label homeowners, and urges accessible retrofit financing and predictable policy.

national_news.title: Söderberg breidt uit met internationale dienstverlening
national_news.summary: Söderberg & Partners launched De Waal & Partners to expand international broker management in the Netherlands, enabling affiliated insurance advisers to arrange cross-border solutions via a vetted global network while retaining client relationships and control.

national_news.title: BND boekt recordjaar met ruim 100.000 nieuwe rekeningen
national_news.summary: Brand New Day added over 100,000 new pension accounts in 2025, lifting total to 450,451 and assets to €10.6bn (+25%). CEO targets €15bn by 2027; growth aided by new pension law and higher contributions.

national_news.title: CFD pleit voor fiscale aftrekbaarheid advieskosten lijfrente
national_news.summary: CFD urges Dutch ministries and MPs to reintroduce tax deductibility of advisory and mediation costs for annuities, limited to independent advisers, arguing it would revive third-pillar pension savings and address inconsistencies under the WTP and ORV rules.

national_news.title: ASR stopt samenwerking met ‘onbetrouwbare’ letselschadepartijen
national_news.summary: Dutch insurer ASR ended cooperation with Fides Letselschade, Fides Legal and Trias Legal, citing lack of trust in their expert and ethical representation of personal injury victims.
